name: @kilohealth/rn-fitness-tracker
description: GoogleFit & Health tracking package for React Native for Android & iOS
author: Kilo.Health

scripts.major: yarn changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && yarn version --major
scripts.minor: yarn changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && yarn version --minor
scripts.patch: yarn changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && yarn version --patch
scripts.tests:ios:build: cd example && yarn detox build --configuration ios
scripts.tests:ios:pod:install: cd example && rm -rf ios/example.xcworkspace && yarn pod-install
scripts.tests:ios:test: cd example && yarn detox test --configuration ios --loglevel warn
scripts.tests:packager:jet-ci: cd example && cross-env TMPDIR=$HOME/.metro REACT_DEBUGGER="echo nope" node_modules/.bin/react-native start --no-interactive
